GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v4.19.254
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix data-races around sysctl_tcp_fastopen.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit 03da610696a32578fc4f986479341ce9d430df08, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit 2100c8d2d9db23c0a09901a782bb4e3b21bee298. For more details please see the references link.
